data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Bío-Bío to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bío-Bío, Chile
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 483,552 believers in Bío-Bío against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Bío-Bío, Chile to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Bío-Bío, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Pashtun, Northern people. Make the Pashtun, Northern people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Bío-Bío to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Bío-Bío. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, provide a Bible for every believer in Bío-Bío, Chile, and teach them to obey it.
data.verse: For if you listen to the word and don’t obey, it is like glancing at your face in a mirror. 24 you see yourself, walk away, and forget what you look like. 25 But if you look carefully into the perfect law that sets you free, and if you do what it says and don’t forget what you heard, then God will bless you for doing it.

location.name: Bío-Bío
location.cities_list: Talcahuano, Los Ángeles, Coronel, Chiguayante, Lota
location.cities_list_w_pop: Talcahuano (252,968), Los Ángeles (125,430), Coronel (92,940), Chiguayante (82,545), Lota (49,763)
